886.Description: Resists Fire for 3 turns at the start of battle.

887.Name: Anti-Ice Master
887.Description: Resists Ice for 3 turns at the start of battle.

888.Name: Anti-Electric Master
888.Description: Resists Electric for 3 turns at the start of battle.

889.Name: Anti-Wind Master
889.Description: Resists Wind for 3 turns at the start of battle.

890.Name: Soul Shift
890.Description: When Shifting to an ally, that ally recovers 5 SP.

891.Name: Soul Chain
891.Description: Recover 5 SP when on the receiving end of a Shift.

892.Name: Soul Link
892.Description: Recover 8 SP when on the receiving end of a Shift.

893.Name: Shift Boost
893.Description: Attack up by 10% until end of turn when on the receiving end of a Shift.

894.Name: Shift Amp
894.Description: Attack up by 20% until end of turn when on the receiving end of a Shift.

895.Name: Drain Ability
895.Description: Doubles the effect of Life Drain and Spirit Drain.

896.Name: Single-Target Boost
896.Description: Increases power of attacks that target 1 foe by 15%.

897.Name: Multi-Target Boost
897.Description: Increases power of attacks that target all foes by 15%.

901.Name: Weakness Boost
901.Description: Increases damage when striking a foe's weakness.

902.Name: Weakness Amp
902.Description: Greatly increases damage when striking a foe's weakness.

903.Name: Healing Master
903.Description: Reduces the SP cost of recovery skills to 50% of their normal SP cost.

904.Name: Healing Apex
904.Description: Reduces the SP cost of recovery skills to 25% of their normal SP cost.

905.Name: Critical Boost
905.Description: Increases critical rate and increases critical hit strength.

906.Name: Critical Amp
906.Description: Greatly increases critical rate and greatly increases critical hit strength.

907.Name: Buff Boost
907.Description: Increases the effects of buffs on self.

908.Name: Buff Amp
908.Description: Greatly increases the effects of buffs on self.

909.Name: Ailment Burst
909.Description: Increases critical rate on foes with ailments (with Mitsuru in battle).

910.Name: Ailment Surge
910.Description: Greatly increases critical rate on foes with ailments (with Mitsuru in battle).

911.Name: Weakness Buffer
911.Description: Reduces damage taken when an ally's weakness is struck.

912.Name: Weakness Mitigator
912.Description: Greatly reduces damage taken when an ally's weakness is struck.

915.Name: Spirit Refresh
915.Description: Automatically recover 5 SP each turn in battle.

916.Name: Spirit Restore
916.Description: Automatically recover 10 SP each turn in battle.

917.Name: Auto Sukunda
917.Description: Lowers Accuracy/Evasion of 1 random foe for 3 turns when a battle starts.

918.Name: Auto Masukunda
918.Description: Lowers Accuracy/Evasion of all foes for 3 turns when a battle starts.

919.Name: Auto Bolster
919.Description: Temporarily increases Attack and Defense of self at the start of battle.

920.Name: Auto Heat Riser
920.Description: Temporarily increases all stats of self at the start of battle.
